definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Bulls win, 88-83, they go to the finals again.
sentences.chinese: 公牛队胜出，88比83，他们再次进入总决赛。

sentences.english: The final is next week. You have to watch it.
sentences.chinese: 没错，下星期是总决赛，你非看不可。

sentences.english: First place winners on the state level qualify to compete at the Global Finals.
sentences.chinese: 首先，州赛的胜出者就有资格参加最后的全球总决赛。

sentences.english: Yeah. The final is next week. You have to watch it.
sentences.chinese: 没错，下星期是总决赛，你非看不可。

sentences.english: Four, five, maybe even six teams from the West have the ability to advance to the NBA Finals.
sentences.chinese: 五甚至是六支球队有可能闯入总决赛。

sentences.english: How so? By beating the three amigos in the NBA Finals.
sentences.chinese: 那又怎么样呢？在NBA总决赛中击败三巨头吧。

sentences.english: Haven’t they seen at least one of the three previous finales?
sentences.chinese: 他们难道没至少看过一集前三季的总决赛？

sentences.english: Special awards will be awarded to the athletes in the Final Round, details will be provided in due course.
sentences.chinese: 总决赛将另设奖励予各参赛者，奖励详情将稍后公布。

sentences.english: Down the final six games have excellent performance.
sentences.chinese: 总决赛六场角逐下往皆跣劣秀的暗示。

sentences.english: And Billups knows a thing or two about championship defense.
sentences.chinese: 同时比卢普斯也对总决赛的防守也略知一二。

sentences.english: Ray Allen was gonna break another record worst performance in the nba final.
sentences.chinese: 雷阿伦会打破另一项记录的，总决赛最差表现的记录。

sentences.english: Such confidence has seen her march all the way to the finals of the Universiade Star.
sentences.chinese: 这样的自信也一路见证她走进大运会之星的总决赛。

sentences.english: People forget that I hadn't been fined for several years up until the Finals.
sentences.chinese: 人们忘记了我在总决赛之前有几年没被罚过款了。

sentences.english: The pain from losing the NBA Finals ran that deep.
sentences.chinese: 总决赛败北的痛好深好深。

sentences.english: This is probably why he won the first prize in the "My hero" final contest.
sentences.chinese: 这或许就是为什么他荣获一等奖“好男儿”总决赛。

definition: to seize the crown/fig. to win a championship/to win gold medal
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
to lose to (sb)/to be outdone by
